content: Here are the PCDE Overview slides presented at the 10a PT/1p ET session: https://confluence.hl7.org/download/attachments/97459186/HL7_FHIRConnectathon26_PCDEOverview.pptx?version=1&modificationDate=1610652112011&api=v2

Recorded track demos have been posted to our track page: https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=97459186#id-202101DaVinciHRex/CDex/PCDEHealthRecord,ClinicalData,&PayerCoverageDecisionExchange-TrackDemos

It includes:

  • Mettle Solutions (Old Plan) to Edifecs (New Plan)
  • MITRE (Old Plan) to Edifecs (New Plan)
